desc: Adds slight chance of damage taken being reduced to 1

dictionary.lore: The Demon Dress, which crystallized the dreams of the hardworking people, left their hopes as just that, mere dreams. However, one of these people inherited the will of these poor souls, and concocted a plan to upgrade the dress, ultimately fashioning it into the Supreme Robe. This avant-garde garment holds more power than its predecessor, though it did not serve to accomplish its initial purpose--to realize the dreams of the people.

name: Supreme Robe
